title: Enhancing Data Science Practical Competencies: Developing Instructional Design Capabilities through Collaborative Classroom Organization

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will create mathematics curriculum instructional design documents based on collaborative teaching organization principles.
Learners will improve the effectiveness of instructional design prototypes by over 80% through peer feedback.
Learners will apply a collaborative instructional design process utilizing digital tools (BYOD).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
